mapper.insert: insert into car(car_code, car_name, car_inc, car_fuel, car_size, car_year, car_trans, car_regdate, car_type, car_img1, car_img2, car_img3) values(#{carCode}, #{carName},#{carInc}, #{carFuel}, #{carSize}, #{carYear}, #{carTrans}, #{carRegdate}, #{carType}, #{carImg1}, #{carImg2}, #{carImg3})
mapper.update: update car set car_code=#{carCode}, car_name=#{carName}, car_inc=#{carInc}, car_fuel=#{carFuel}, car_size=#{carSize}, car_year=#{carYear}, car_trans=#{carTrans}, car_regdate=#{carRegdate}, car_type=#{carType}, car_img1=#{carImg1}, car_img2=#{carImg2}, car_img3=#{carImg3} where car_code=#{carCode}
